sections.heading: therapy assistant, defined.Occupational therapy assistant means a person licensed to assist in the practice of occupational therapy under the Occupational Therapy Practice Act and who works under the appropriate supervision of, and in collaboration with, an occupational therapist

sections.text:
38-2512.Occupational therapy assistant, defined.

Occupational therapy assistant means a person licensed to assist in the practice of occupational therapy under the Occupational Therapy Practice Act and who works under the appropriate supervision of, and in collaboration with, an occupational therapist.

SourceLaws 2007, LB463, ยง 852;Laws 2025, LB257, ยง 9.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
